userdoc.notice: DelayedWETH is an extension to WETH9 that allows for delayed withdrawals. Accounts must trigger an unlock         function before they can withdraw WETH. Accounts must trigger unlock by specifying a sub-account and an         amount of WETH to unlock. Accounts can trigger the unlock function at any time, but must wait a delay         period before they can withdraw after the unlock function is triggered. DelayedWETH is designed to be used         by the DisputeGame contracts where unlock will only be triggered after a dispute is resolved. DelayedWETH         is meant to sit behind a proxy contract and has an owner address that can pull WETH from any account and         can recover ETH from the contract itself. Variable and function naming vaguely follows the vibe of WETH9.         Not the prettiest contract in the world, but it gets the job done.

params.guy: The address that is approved to transfer the WETH.
params.wad: The amount that is approved to transfer.

returns._0: True if the approval was successful.

params._delay: The delay for withdrawals in seconds.

params._guy: The address to recover the WETH from.
params._wad: The amount of WETH to recover.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params._wad: The amount of WETH to recover.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.dst: The address to transfer the WETH to.
params.wad: The amount of WETH to transfer.

returns._0: True if the transfer was successful.

params.dst: The address to transfer the WETH to.
params.src: The address to transfer the WETH from.
params.wad: The amount of WETH to transfer.

returns._0: True if the transfer was successful.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._wad: The amount of WETH to unlock.
The amount of WETH to withdraw.

documentation.text:
@title DelayedWETH
 @notice DelayedWETH is an extension to WETH9 that allows for delayed withdrawals. Accounts must trigger an unlock
         function before they can withdraw WETH. Accounts must trigger unlock by specifying a sub-account and an
         amount of WETH to unlock. Accounts can trigger the unlock function at any time, but must wait a delay
         period before they can withdraw after the unlock function is triggered. DelayedWETH is designed to be used
         by the DisputeGame contracts where unlock will only be triggered after a dispute is resolved. DelayedWETH
         is meant to sit behind a proxy contract and has an owner address that can pull WETH from any account and
         can recover ETH from the contract itself. Variable and function naming vaguely follows the vibe of WETH9.
         Not the prettiest contract in the world, but it gets the job done.
